Directory: obj/bod/

Contents

.pro files

bod_aberration.pro

Returns the aberration flags for each given body descriptor.

bod_assign.pro

Replaces fields in a BODY object.

bod_avel.pro

Returns the angular velocity for each given body descriptor.

bod_body_to_inertial.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the body coordinate system to the inertial coordinate system.

bod_body_to_inertial_default.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the body coordinate system to the inertial coordinate system.

bod_body_to_inertial_pos.pro

Transforms the given column position vectors from the body coordinate system to the inertial coordinate system.

bod_body_to_inertial_vel.pro

Transforms the given column velocity vectors from the body coordinate system to the inertial coordinate system.

bod_body_to_radec.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the body coordinate system to the RA/DEC coordinate system associated to that body.

bod_body_to_radec_vel.pro

Transforms the given column velocity vectors from the body coordinate system to the RA/DEC coordinate system associated with that body.

bod_create_descriptors.pro

Init method for the BODY class.

bod_dlibdt.pro

Returns the frequency of each libration vector for each given body descriptor.

bod_evolve.pro

Computes new body descriptors at the given time offsets from the given body descriptors using the taylor series expansion corresponding to the derivatives contained in the given body descriptor.

bod_get_radec_ranges.pro

Returns ranges of valid radec coordinates for the given BODY object.

bod_ib_data.pro

Returns the function data for a body descriptor.

bod_inertial.pro

Returns body descriptors defining te inertial coordinate system.

bod_inertial_to_body.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the inertial coordinate system to the body coordinate system.

bod_inertial_to_body_default.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the inertial coordinate system to the body coordinate system.

bod_inertial_to_body_pos.pro

Transforms the given column position vectors from the inertial coordinate system to the body coordinate system.

bod_inertial_to_body_vel.pro

Transforms the given column velocity vectors from the inertial coordinate system to the body coordinate system.

bod_lib.pro

Returns the phase of the libration vector at body time for each given body descriptor.

bod_libv.pro

Returns the libration vector for each given body descriptor.

bod_ndv.pro

Returns an integer indicating the maximum number of time derivatives allowed in the vel and avel fields of the body descriptor.

bod_opaque.pro

Returns the opaque value for each given body descriptor.

bod_orient.pro

Returns the orientation matrix for each given body descriptor.

bod_pos.pro

Returns the position of body center (in the inertial frame) for each given body descriptor.

bod_query.pro

Returns the fields associated with a BODY object.

bod_radec_to_body.pro

Transforms the given column vectors from the RA/DEC coordinate system associated to the body to the body coordinate system.

bod_radec_to_body_vel.pro

Transforms the given column velocity vectors from the RA/DEC coordinate system associated to the body to the body coordinate system.

bod_recenter.pro

Transforms a body descriptor into another body frame.

bod_reorient.pro

Rotates the orientation matrix of each body such that the specified axis vector is parallel to the given vector.

bod_replicate.pro

Replicates the given descriptor, producing an array of the given dimensions containing cloned versions of the input descriptor.

bod_rotate.pro

Rotates a body about one its axes.

bod_set_aberration.pro

Sets aberration flags for each given body descriptor.

bod_set_avel.pro

Replaces the angular velocity vector of each given body descriptor.

bod_set_dlibdt.pro

Replaces the frequency of each libration vector for each given body descriptor.

bod_set_ib_data.pro

Replaces the function data for a body descriptor.

bod_set_lib.pro

Replaces the phase of the libration vector at body time for each given body descriptor.

bod_set_libv.pro

Replaces the libration vector of each given body descriptor.

bod_set_opaque.pro

Replaces the opaque flag of each given body descriptor.

bod_set_orient.pro

Replaces the orientation matrix of each given body descriptor.

bod_set_pos.pro

Replaces the position of body center (in the inertial frame) of each given body descriptor.

bod_set_time.pro

Replaces the time of each given body descriptor.

bod_set_vel.pro

Replaces the velocity vector (of body center in the inertial frame) of each given body descriptor.

bod_time.pro

Returns the time for each given body descriptor.

bod_vel.pro

Returns the velocity of body center (in the inertial frame) for each given body descriptor.

Class structure for the BODY class.
